thread.title: Disneyland Hotel is 60 years old, too
thread.title_full: Disneyland Hotel is 60 years old, too

author: JOSEPH PIMENTEL
title: Disneyland Hotel is 60 years old, too
text: Disneyland Hotel is 60 years old, too Oct. 22, 2015 Updated 6:00 a.m. 1 of 19 The $3,500-a-night Adventureland-themed penthouse suite is one of six Signature suites at the Disneyland Hotel. The other Signature suites are Pirates of the Caribbean Suite, Fairy Tale Suite, Mickey Mouse Penthouse, Big Thunder Mountain Suite and Blue Sky Suite. JOSHUA SUDOCK, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 19 The $3,500-a-night Adventureland-themed penthouse suite is one of six Signature suites at the Disneyland Hotel. The other Signature suites are Pirates of the Caribbean Suite, Fairy Tale Suite, Mickey Mouse Penthouse, Big Thunder Mountain Suite and Blue Sky Suite. JOSHUA SUDOCK, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 19 A view of the Fantasy Tower at the Disneyland Hotel. The hotel's reception desk is on the first floor of this tower. MARK EADES, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 19 The "E-Ticket" swimming pool at the Disneyland Hotel. JOSHUA SUDOCK, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 19 The entrance to Trader Sam's, a Tiki themed cocktail lounge at the Disneyland Hotel. JOSHUA SUDOCK, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 19 An interior shot of one of the standard rooms at the Disneyland Hotel JOSHUA SUDOCK, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 19 An aerial view of the Disneyland Hotel in the early 1980s. COURTESY, THE DISNEYLAND RESORT 1 of 19 The Disneyland Hotel sported a marina by the late 1970s between its towers. The Marina was removed after the hotel was purchased by the Walt Disney Company in 1988. The area is now occupied by a swimming pool. COURTESY, THE DISNEYLAND RESORT 1 of 19 This waterfall was located at the base of the Bonita tower of the Disneyland Hotel. The tower is now known as the Frontier Tower, and the waterfall was removed in 2010. COURTESY, THE DISNEYLAND RESORT 1 of 19 An aerial view of the Disneyland Hotel taken in the 1980s. FILE PHOTO: H. LOREN AU, JR., STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 19 The $3,500-a-night Adventureland-themed penthouse suite is one of six Signature suites at the Disneyland Hotel. The other Signature suites are Pirates of the Caribbean Suite, Fairy Tale Suite, Mickey Mouse Penthouse, Big Thunder Mountain Suite and Blue Sky Suite. JOSHUA SUDOCK, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 19 The $3,500-a-night Adventureland-themed penthouse suite is one of six Signature suites at the Disneyland Hotel. The other Signature suites are Pirates of the Caribbean Suite, Fairy Tale Suite, Mickey Mouse Penthouse, Big Thunder Mountain Suite and Blue Sky Suite. JOSHUA SUDOCK, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 19 A bathtub sits in the middle of the master bedroom inside the $3,500-a-night Adventureland-themed penthouse suite. The suite is one of six Signature suites at the Disneyland Hotel. The other Signature suites are Pirates of the Caribbean Suite, Fairy Tale Suite, Mickey Mouse Penthouse, Big Thunder Mountain Suite and Blue Sky Suite. JOSHUA SUDOCK, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 19 Another view of the inside of the $3,500-a-night Disneyland Hotel Adventureland-themed Suite, one of six Signature suites the hotel offers guests. JOSHUA SUDOCK, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 19 Artwork inspired by the Jungle Cruise decorates the $3,500-a-night Adventureland-themed Suite, one of six Signature suites at the Disneyland Hotel. The other Signature suites are Pirates of the Caribbean Suite, Fairy Tale Suite, Mickey Mouse Penthouse, Big Thunder Mountain Suite and Blue Sky Suite. JOSHUA SUDOCK, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 19 1 of 19 Before Downtown Disney was built, there used to be a tram that would take visitors from the entrance to Disneyland to the Disneyland Hotel. COURTESY, THE DISNEYLAND RESORT 1 of 19 1 of 19 View slideshow The $3,500-a-night Adventureland-themed penthouse suite is one of six Signature suites at the Disneyland Hotel. The other Signature suites are Pirates of the Caribbean Suite, Fairy Tale Suite, Mickey Mouse Penthouse, Big Thunder Mountain Suite and Blue Sky Suite. JOSHUA SUDOCK, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER
